name: British Airways SAAB 2000 Full Flight - Isle of Man to London City
description:
Full length, full flight, video onboard British Airways (op by Eastern Airways) Saab 2000 G-CERZ, operating flight BA3285 from Isle of Man to London City, on 17 June 2014.  *Every minute of the flight included from pushback to pulling on stand.*

This is the entire flight from engine start to engine stop without gaps, including a beautiful approach over the Docklands of London onto runway 09 at London City.

Video taken from seat 3F.

Map of the flight route (taken from GPS tracker onboard): http://bit.ly/1nkhQWV

Please subscribe/comment!

GoPro Hero 3

✈ ✈
Equipment used:

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
Swivel Mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y
